rule.title: Caustic Blast
rule.line: You fling a glob of acid that immediately detonates, spraying nearby creatures. Creatures in the area take 1d8 acid damage with a basic Reflex save. On a critical failure, the creature also takes 1 persistent acid damage.
rule.heighten: The initial damage increases by 1d8, and the persistent damage on a critical failure increases by 1.

rule.title: Detect Magic
rule.line: You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the rpesence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the level of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.
rule.heighten: You learn the rank or level of the most powerful magical effect within range that the spell detects, as determined by the GM.

As 3rd rank, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-rank magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but you can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

rule.title: Eat Fire
rule.duration: until the end of your next turn
rule.line: You consume and ingest fire, making it less harmful to you. You gain resistance 5 to fire damage until the end of the current turn.
During the remaining duration of the spell, you can use the Belch Smoke action. The spell ends if you fall unconscious, inhale, or exhale (this includes speaking).

block.name: Belch Smoke
block.part: You exhale what remains of the smoke, ending the spell and creating a smoke cloud in a 5-foot burst within 20 feet. All creatures within the smoke cloud are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

rule.heighten: The resistance increases by 5.

rule.title: Electric Arc
rule.line: An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. Each target takes 2d4 electricity damage, with a basic Reflex save.
rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d4.

rule.title: Frostbite
rule.line: An orb of biting cold coalesces around your target, freezing its body. The target takes 2d4 cold damage, with a basic Fortitude save. On a critical failure, the target also gains weakness 1 to bludgeoning until the start of your next turn.
rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d4 and the weakness on a critical failure increases by 1.

rule.title: Gale Blast
rule.line: Wind flows from your outstretched hands and whirls around you. Each creature in the area takes 1d8 bludgeoning damage, with a Fortitude save.

line.fail: The creature takes full damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.
line.critfail: The creature takes double damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you.

rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d8.

rule.title: Glass Shield
rule.duration: until the start of your next turn
rule.line: You summon a layer of glass to keep you from harm. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

You can use the Shield Block reaction with the glass shield. It has Hardness 2. You can use the spell's reaction to reduce damage from any spell or magical effect, even if it doesn't deal physical damage. When you Shield Block, the shield explodes in a shower of glass. If the creature that broke it is within 5 feet, the shards deal 2d4 piercing damage to that creature, with a basic Reflex save. After you Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes.
rule.heighten: The shield has Hardness 4, and the damage increases to 3d4.
The shield has Hardness 7, and the damage increases to 4d4.
The shield has Hardness 10, and the damage increases to 5d4.
The shield has Hardness 14, and the damage increases to 6d4.

rule.title: Gouging Claw
rule.line: You temporarily morph your limb into a clawed appendage. Make a melee spell attack roll against your target's AC. If you hit, you deal your choice of 2d6 slashing or 2d6 piercing damage, plus 2 persistent bleed damage. On a critical success, you deal double damage and double bleed damage.
rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d6 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

rule.title: Guidance
rule.duration: Until the start of your next turn
rule.line: You ask for the guidance of supernatural entities, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

rule.title: Healing Plaster
rule.targets: a handful of dirt or mud
rule.line: You purify some dirt or mud into a pliable, claylike plaster that can aid in clotting and healing. This restorative substance can be used in lieu of healer's tools for Medicine checks to Administer First Aid or Treat Wounds. If you have the Battle Medicine feat, you can also use the plaster for that action. If the plaster isn't used within the spell's duration, or if you Cast the Spell again before using the plaster, it revers to being non-magical earth.
rule.heighten: The plaster grants anyone using it a +1 item bonus to the Medicine check.

rule.title: Ignition
rule.line: You snap your fingers and point at a target, which begins to smolder. Make a ranged spell attack roll against your target's AC, dealing 2d4 fire damage on a hit. If the target is within your melee reach, you can choose to make a melee spell attack with the flame instead of a ranged spell attack, which increases all the spell's damage dice to d6s.

line.critsuccess: The target takes double damage, and 1d4 persistent fire damage.

rule.heighten: The initial damage increases by 1d4, and the persistent fire damage on a critical hit increases by 1d4.

rule.title: Light
rule.line: You create an orb of light that sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) in a color you choose. If you create the light in the same space as a willing creature, you can attach the light to the creature, causing it to float near that creature as it moves.
You can Sustain the the spell to move the light up to 60 feet; you can attach or detach it from a creature as part of this movement.
You can Dismiss the spell. If you Cast the Spell while you already have four light spells active, you must choose one of the existing spells to end.
rule.heighten: The orb sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

rule.title: Live Wire
rule.line: You conjure a length of sharp copper filament humming with electrical current that strikes out at your foe. The wire deals 1d4 slashing damage and 1d4 electricity damage, depending on your ranged spell attack roll against the target's AC.

line.critsuccess: The target takes double damage, and 1d4 persistent electricity damage.
line.fail: The target takes the electricity damage, but not the slashing damage.

rule.heighten: The persistent electricity damage on a critical hit increases by 1d4.
The slashing damage and initial electricity damage each increase by 1d4.

rule.title: Needle Darts
rule.line: You shape needles out of a piece of metal in your possession and sen them flying in a tight group toward one target. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target's AC. The needles deal 3d4 piercing damage and might cause bleeding.

line.critsuccess: The target takes double damage and 1 persistent bleed damage.

rule.line: The needles impart any special properties of the metal that forms them; for instance, cold iron needles deal additional damage to creatures with weakness to cold iron. All needles are made of the same metal, and the metal returns to you after the attack.
rule.heighten: You send additional needles, increasing the regular damage by 1d4 and increasing the persistent bleed damage on a critical hit by 1.

rule.title: Puff of Poison
rule.line: You exhale a shimmering cloud of toxic breath at an enemy's face. The target takes 1d8 poison damage and 2 persistent poison damage, depending on its Fortitude save.

line.success: The target takes half initial and half persistent damage.
line.fail: The target takes full initial and persistent damage.
line.critfail: The target takes double initial and double persistent damage.

rule.heighten: The initial poison damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent poison damage increases by 2.

rule.title: Ray of Frost
rule.line: You blast an icy ray. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target's AC. The ray deals 2d4 cold damage.

line.critsuccess: The target takes double damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn.
line.success: The target takes normal damage and takes a -5-foot penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn.

rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d4.

rule.title: Rousing Splash
rule.line: You cause a splash of cold water to descend on an ally's head, granting some temporary vigor. The target gains 1d4 temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 minute. The target is then temporarily immune to the temporary Hit Points from rousing splash for 10 minutes.
The target can also attempt an immediate flat check to recover from a single source of persistent acid or fire damage, with the DC reduction from appropriate assistance.
rule.heighten: The amount of temporary Hit Points granted increases by 1d4.

rule.title: Scatter Scree
rule.line: You evoke a jumble of rocks in the area. The scattering rocks deal 2d4 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area, with a basic Reflex save. The ground in the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. A creature can Interact to clear a square of this scree.
If you cast this spell again, any previous scatter scree you have cast ends.
rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d4.

rule.title: Spout
rule.line: Water blasts upward, coming out of the ground, rising from a pool, or even manifesting from thin air. Any creatures in the area take 2d4 bludgeoning damage, with a basic Reflex save. A creature that critically fails its save is disoriented by the explosion of water, becoming off-guard until the end of your next turn.
You can change this spell's area to a 5-foot burst, provided you center the burst in a body of water. This body of water can be as small as a pond or creek, but not as small as a puddle or bathtub.
rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d4.

rule.title: Stabilize
rule.line: Life energy shuts death's door. The target loses the dying condition, though it remains unconscious at 0 Hit Points.

rule.title: Tangle Vine
rule.line: A vine appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a ranged spell attack against the taget.

line.critsuccess: The target gains the immobilized condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the immobilized condition.
line.success: The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

rule.heighten: The effects last for 2 rounds.
The effects last for 1 minute.

rule.title: Timber
rule.line: You create a small dead tree in your space that falls over on anyone in its path, then immediately decomposes. Any creature in the area takes damage equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier, with a basic Reflex saving throw. A creature that critically fails its save is knocked for a loop, making it dazzled until the end of its next turn.
rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d4.

rule.title: Vitality Lash
rule.targets: 1 creature that is undead or otherwise has void healing
rule.line: You demolish the target's corrupted essence with energy from Creation's Forge. The target takes 2d6 vitality damage, with a basic Fortitude save. On a critical failure, the target is also enfeebled 1 until the start of your next turn.
rule.heighten: The damage increases by 1d6.
